SuperTux 2 is quite fun to play, and by far is the best platforming game for Linux (if there are others?). I've played this game for a long time and it has been a consistently enjoyable experience.

One thing I wish was improved is the velocity when you land on a platform. It feels too slippery for a platformer, and although it is based on snow/ice, it still doesn't make for a good game mechanic. I would prefer to see the velocity of the penguin slow down significantly quicker, so as to avoid slipping off the platform or accidentally overcorrecting for the slide.
summary: Best platformer for Linux and good fun, but could use improvements

description: I remember first playing SuperTux on SuSE Linux Professional 9.3 back in 2005 and it was really fun! Supertux 2 is just as enjoyable. I've completed all main levels and would definitely recommend it.

First of all, this is a great app, similar to super mario bros but with different levels. I enjoy this game very much. It also includes a level editor, which is a great feature that you can experiment with. It's a bit difficult to use at times though, because there's no in-game tutorial on how the level editor.

Unfortunately, the game has been crashing often lately, which can be really frustrating for newer players. But overall, it's a really great, and it's outstanding for being a free, open source game.

description:
El juego está inspirado en Mario Bros a pesar de eso el juego es muy bueno.
Es cierto que toma de referencias muchas cosas pero tambien tiene su toque único. Este es el primer juego con el que pude conocer Gnu linux y es muy bueno. sigan mejorandolo. pero ya agregando inspiracion propia y mejorando un poco el sprite o skin de tux.

description: Bon petit jeu proche d'un super mario bros.
Très bon jeu avec un gameplay tout à fait correct et un contenu riche

J'y joue depuis à peu près 10 ans, sur toutes plateformes (Mac, Windows, Linux), et avec les mises à jour, notamment celle rajoutant l'éditeur de niveaux, on ne s'en lasse pas (encore moins quand il y a des niveaux avec scripts)
Cela fait des années que je joue et j'adore ce jeu. Surtout créer des niveaux.
on dirait super Mario

нормальная игра.
Клон Super Mario Bros. с Famicom/NES/Dendy, полностью копирует механики оригинальной игры, добавляя и свои оригинальные наработки. Минус - игрок может не сразу врубится, как уйти с уровня-вступления.
Игра приятная, но сложность слишком быстро прибавляется, что невозможно в дальнейшем уже. 1 карту прошёл всё таки.
